content: because i think it works better for tiny toes if you prefer a rounder toe you can use the round toe instructions from the original rose city rollers pattern round one- k1 ssk k to last 3 top of toe stitches k2tog k2 ssk k to last 3 bottom of toe stitches k2tog k1 round two- knit all stitches repeat these two rounds until 12 16 16 20 24 24 stitches remain divide stitches evenly over 2 needles 6 8 8 10 12 12 stitches per needle kitchener stitch together weave in and trim ends these little socks go quick and are a great use for scraps of leftover yarn if you re unsure how a color combination will look on an adult sock try knitting one of these as a demo round when i knit socks as baby gifts i like to do pair- and-a-spare sets 3 mix and match socks just in case one gets lost if you re feeling adventurous these numbers can be substituted into my jelly rolls pattern for itty-bitty jellys have fun and happy knitting rose city rollers le orangeknitsdesigns 4
